'''Guide to the Original Current''' is one of the [[Guidance of the Land]] boxes that can be obtained from purchasing the Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus packages for [[Battle Pass]].
After reaching the prerequisite levels, collecting the box will prompt the player to choose between one of the following:
{{Card|Guide to Equity|5|show_caption=1}}
{{Card|Guide to Justice|5|show_caption=1}}
{{Card|Guide to Order|5|show_caption=1}}
